content: stitches remaining do not turn work begin gusset gusset pick up and knit one stitch in each slipped stitch along side of heel pm to indicate start of instep purl 33 39 stitches to next marker pick up and knit same one less number of stitches along remaining side of heel pm to indicate end of instep knit 10 11 stitches and place marker the beginning of the round is now the middle of the
